name: E.A.R.T.H.
description:
E.A.R.T.H.

(Environmental Action Research Training Headquarters) is an Educational Strategy Board Game about fighting climate change.

Work your way through each of the 3 different levels in attempt of creating the most Earth Resources, while minimizing your footprint as best as possible.

How To Play

Click and drag the spin crank. Answer the questions to the best of your ability, and strategize the best path forward.

Credits

Mare Unite - The Idea

Joe Greive - The Rest

Note - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY EXE VERSION

There is currently a bug where the WebGL version can crash at the end of the game when trying to submit scores to the leaderboard. The .exe version does not suffer from this.
